questions.quote: Look. Kevin. I really like you, heh, heh, uh. But, um, maybe we'd be, better off just being.. friends.
I don't need a personal trainer.  all right I've got to go, we'll talk about this later.
Ok, here's the deal. He wants you to acknowledge that you cut him off with an "I am sorry" wave.
Kramer, do you realize what's going on here? Do you know why you're here?
Santa is not a Commie. He just forgot how his good friend stuck his neck out for him to get him a good job like this. Didn't he Santa!
You need some new material. I've heard you do that dog routine three times already.
Wait a minute, that is my apartment. I earned it with 34 years of misery!
. Hi this is Bob from the Andover Shop. I'm trying to reach Craig Stewart. He left this number.

Elaine, of course I'm concerned. I'm payin' for those meals. It's like throwing money down the toilet.
